sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,BANK_ID ,BANK_NAME ,CARD_NO_LENGTH ,CARD_BIN ,UPOP_FLAG ,CARD_TYPE ,BANK_SHORT_NAME FROM CARD_BIN_NEW WHERE 1=1 AND CARD_BIN_NEW.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(BANK_ID) Like '%'||(#bank_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_NO_LENGTH) Like '%'||(#card_no_length:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_BIN) Like '%'||(#card_bin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPOP_FLAG) Like '%'||(#upop_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_TYPE) Like '%'||(#card_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_SHORT_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_short_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM CARD_BIN_NEW WHERE 1=1 AND CARD_BIN_NEW.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(BANK_ID) Like '%'||(#bank_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_NO_LENGTH) Like '%'||(#card_no_length:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_BIN) Like '%'||(#card_bin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(UPOP_FLAG) Like '%'||(#upop_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_TYPE) Like '%'||(#card_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_SHORT_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_short_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
